00126 O_state* O_state::rec_upSLT(list<O_state*>* path, int ctxtmin)
00127 {
00128         if (suff.second >= ctxtmin)
00129         {
00130                 path->push_front(suff.first);
00131                 return suff.first->rec_upSLT(path, ctxtmin);
00132         }
00133         else
00135                 return this;
00136 }
00137 
00142 list<pair<O_state*,int> >* O_state::rec_downSLT(list<pair<O_state*,int> >* SLTlist, int ctxtmin)
00143 {
00144         list<pair<O_state*,int> >::const_iterator rit;
00145         for (rit = rsuff.begin(); rit != rsuff.end(); rit++)
00146         {
00147                 if ((*rit).second >= ctxtmin)
00148                 {
00149                         SLTlist->push_back((*rit));
00150                         (*rit).first->rec_downSLT(SLTlist, ctxtmin);
00151                 }
00152         }
00154         return SLTlist;
00155 }
00156 
00161 list<pair<O_state*,int> >* O_state::rec_sortSLT(list<pair<O_state*,int> >* SLTlist, int ctxtmin, int ctxt)
00162 {
00163         list<pair<O_state*,int> > sorted_rsuff = rsuff;
00164         sorted_rsuff.sort(sort_rsuff);
00165         list<pair<O_state*,int> >::reverse_iterator rit;
00166         for (rit = sorted_rsuff.rbegin(); rit!=sorted_rsuff.rend(); ++rit)
00167         {
00168                 if ((*rit).second >= ctxtmin)
00169                 {
00170                         (*rit).first->rec_sortSLT(SLTlist,ctxtmin,min(ctxt,(*rit).second));
00171                         pair<O_state*,int> node = (*rit);
00172                         node.second=min(node.second,ctxt);
00173                         SLTlist->push_back((node));
00174                 }
00175         }
00177         return SLTlist;
00178 }
00179 
00183 list<pair<O_state*,int> >* O_state::sortedSLT(int ctxtmin, int nbMaxSol)
00184 {
00185         int NbSol;
00186         list<pair<O_state*,int> > * solutions = new list<pair<O_state*,int> >;
00187         
00188         rec_sortSLT(solutions,ctxtmin);
00189         NbSol = solutions->size();
00190         
00191         O_state * Node = this;
00192         O_state * upNode = suff.first;
00193         int currentCtxt = suff.second;
00194         list<pair<O_state*,int> > sorted_rsuff;
00195         while (NbSol<=nbMaxSol && Node->suff.second>=ctxtmin && upNode!=NULL)
00196         {
00197                 pair<O_state*,int> father = Node->suff;
00198                 currentCtxt=father.second;
00199                 solutions->push_back(father);
00200                 sorted_rsuff = upNode->rsuff;
00201                 sorted_rsuff.sort(sort_rsuff);
00202                 list<pair<O_state*,int> >::reverse_iterator rit;
00203                 for (rit = sorted_rsuff.rbegin(); (*rit).first!=Node; ++rit)
00204                 {
00205                         pair<O_state*,int> brother = (*rit);
00206                         brother.second=currentCtxt;
00207                         solutions->push_back(brother);
00208                         (*rit).first->rec_sortSLT(solutions, ctxtmin, currentCtxt);
00209                 }
00210                 NbSol = solutions->size();
00211                 if (NbSol>=nbMaxSol)
00212                         break;
00213                 else
00214                 {
00215                         for (++rit; rit!=sorted_rsuff.rend(); ++rit)
00216                         {
00217                                 pair<O_state*,int> brother = (*rit);
00218                                 if (brother.second>=ctxtmin)
00219                                 {
00220                                         brother.second=min(brother.second,currentCtxt);
00221                                         solutions->push_back(brother);
00222                                         (*rit).first->rec_sortSLT(solutions, ctxtmin, min(brother.second,currentCtxt));
00223                                 }
00224                                 NbSol = solutions->size();
00225                                 if (NbSol>=nbMaxSol)
00226                                         break;
00227                         }
00228                 }
00229                 upNode = upNode->suff.first;
00230                 Node = Node->suff.first;
00231         }
00232         return solutions;
00233 }

00247 ostream & operator<< (ostream & out, O_state & statein)
00248 {
00249         list<O_state*>::const_iterator transit;
00250         out<<"  {"<<endl;
00251         out<<"          "<<statein.statenb<<" [id = "<<statein.get_bufferef()<<", xlabel = "<<statein.get_letter()<<"]"<<endl;
00252         for (transit = statein.trans.begin(); transit != statein.trans.end(); transit++)
00253         {
00254                 if (transit == statein.trans.begin())
00255                         out<<"          "<<statein.statenb<<" -> "<<(*transit)->get_statenb()<<endl;
00256                 else
00257                         out<<"          "<<statein.statenb<<" -> "<<(*transit)->get_statenb()<<" [constraint = false]"<<endl;
00258         }
00259         out<<"          "<<endl;
00260         if (statein.get_suffix().first != NULL)
00261                 out<<"          "<<statein.statenb<<" -> "<<statein.suff.first->get_statenb()<<" [label = "<<statein.suff.second<<", constraint = false, style = dotted]"<<endl;
00262         out<<"  }"<<endl;
00263         return(out);
00264 }

00266 
00267 bool sort_rsuff (pair<O_state*,int> rsuff1, pair<O_state*,int> rsuff2)
00268 {
00269         if (rsuff1.second==rsuff2.second)
00270                 return ((rsuff1.first->get_statenb())<(rsuff2.first->get_statenb()));
00271         else
00272                 return (rsuff1.second<rsuff2.second);
00273 }

00288 O_oracle::~O_oracle()
00289 {
00290         vector<O_state*>::iterator O_it;
00291         for(O_it = state_vect.begin();O_it != state_vect.end();O_it++)
00292                 delete *O_it;
00293     delete IDs2states;
00294     delete states2IDs;
00295 }

00304 void O_oracle::freestates()
00305 {
00306         vector<O_state*>::reverse_iterator O_it;
00307         for(O_it = state_vect.rbegin();O_it != state_vect.rend();++O_it)
00308         {
00309                 delete *O_it;
00310                 state_vect.pop_back();
00311         }
00312         size = state_vect.size();
00313 }
00314 
00315 void O_oracle::resolve_trans()
00316 {
00317         vector<O_state*>::iterator O_it;
00318         for(O_it = state_vect.begin();O_it != state_vect.end();O_it++)
00319         {
00320                 list<O_state*> translist = (*O_it)->get_trans();
00321                 (*O_it)->reset_trans();
00322                 list<O_state*>::iterator transit;
00323                 for (transit = translist.begin();transit != translist.end();transit++)
00324                 {
00325                         
00326                         (*O_it)->add_trans(this->operator[]((long)(*transit)));
00327                         //cout <<"resolved index: "<<(*O_it)->get_trans().back()->get_statenb()<<endl;
00328                 }
00329                 translist.reverse();
00330         }
00331 }

00348 // initialisation
00350 void O_oracle::start()
00351 {
00352         if(size <= 0)
00353         {
00354                 //O_state * newstate = new O_state(0, -1);
00355                 //state_vect.push_back(newstate);
00356                 size = state_vect.size();
00357         IDs2states = new map<int,int>();
00358                 (*IDs2states)[0]=0;
00359                 states2IDs = new map<int,int>();
00360                 (*states2IDs)[0]=0;
00361         }
00362 }
00363 
00364 // build
00366 int O_oracle::add(int letterIn, int bufferefIn)
00367 {
00368         // initialisation if needed
00369         if (state_vect.size()<1)
00370         {
00371                 this->start();
00372         O_state * newstate = new O_state(0, -1);
00373                 state_vect.push_back(newstate);
00374         }
00375         
00376         int newstatenb;
00377         
00378         O_state * O_it = state_vect.back(); // old last
00379         newstatenb = O_it->get_statenb()+1; // new number
00380         
00381         // create new state
00382         O_state * newstate = new O_state(newstatenb, letterIn, bufferefIn);
00383         state_vect.push_back(newstate); // add
00384         size = state_vect.size(); // update size
00385         
00386         // basic transition
00387         O_it->add_trans(newstate);
00388         
00389         // suffix algorithm
00390         pair<int,int> newsuffix=suffix(*newstate, letterIn); //<LRS inside
00391         
00392         state_vect.back()->set_suffix(state_vect[newsuffix.first],newsuffix.second);
00393         
00394         // reversed suffix
00395         pair<O_state*,int> * rsuff = new pair<O_state*,int>(newstate,newsuffix.second);
00396         state_vect[newsuffix.first]->add_rsuff(*rsuff);
00397     
00398     // update hashtables
00399     add_state(newstatenb, bufferefIn);
00400     add_date(bufferefIn, newstatenb);
00401         
00403         return (newstatenb);
00404 }
00405 
00407 pair<int,int> O_oracle::suffix(O_state & statein, int letterIn)
00408 {
00409         int j,k;
00410         pair<int,int> suffixout;
00411         O_state* butlast = state_vect[statein.get_statenb()-1];
00412         j = butlast->get_statenb();
00414         if(butlast->get_suffix().first)
00415                 k = butlast->get_suffix().first->get_statenb();
00416         else
00417                 k = -1;
00418         while (k>=0 && search_trans(*state_vect[k], letterIn)==-1)
00419         {
00420                 state_vect[k]->add_trans(&statein);
00421                 j = k;
00422                 if(state_vect[k]->get_suffix().first)
00423                         k = state_vect[k]->get_suffix().first->get_statenb();
00424                 else
00425                         k = -1;
00426         }
00427         if (k==-1)
00428                 suffixout.first = 0;
00429         else
00430                 suffixout.first = search_trans(*state_vect[k], letterIn);
00431     
00433         suffixout.second = lrs(*state_vect[j],*state_vect[suffixout.first]); //lrs
00434     
00436         list<pair<O_state*, int> > rsufflist = state_vect[suffixout.first]->get_rsuff();
00437         list<pair<O_state*, int> >::iterator rsuffit;
00438         for (rsuffit=rsufflist.begin(); rsuffit!=rsufflist.end(); rsuffit++)
00439         {
00440                 if ((*rsuffit).second == suffixout.second)
00441                 {
00442                         if ((state_vect[(*rsuffit).first->get_statenb()-(*rsuffit).second])->get_letter() == (state_vect[statein.get_statenb()-(*rsuffit).second])->get_letter())
00443                         {
00444                                 suffixout.first=(*rsuffit).first->get_statenb();
00445                                 suffixout.second++;
00446                                 break;
00447                                 //cout << "found better: "<<(*rsuffit).first->get_statenb()<<"<--"<<statein->get_statenb()<<endl;
00448                         }
00449                 }
00450         }
00451     
00453         return suffixout;
00454 }
00455 
00457 int O_oracle::lrs(O_state & state1, O_state & state2)
00458 {
00459         if(state2.get_statenb() == 0)
00460                 return 0;
00461         else
00462         {
00463                 O_state * pi2 = state_vect[state2.get_statenb()-1];
00464                 if (pi2->get_statenb() == state1.get_suffix().first->get_statenb())
00465                         return(state1.get_suffix().second + 1);
00466                 else
00467                 {
00468                         while (pi2->get_suffix().first != state1.get_suffix().first)
00469                                 pi2 = pi2->get_suffix().first;
00470                         if (state1.get_suffix().second> pi2->get_suffix().second)
00471                                 return(pi2->get_suffix().second + 1);
00472                         else
00473                                 return(state1.get_suffix().second + 1);
00475                 }
00476         }
00477 }
00478 
00480 int O_oracle::search_trans(O_state & statein, int letterIn)
00481 {
00482         int intout = -1;
00483         bool found = false;
00484         list<O_state*> thistrans = statein.get_trans();
00485         list<O_state*>::iterator transit;
00486         for (transit = thistrans.begin(); (!found) && (transit != thistrans.end()); transit++)
00487         {
00488                 if ((*transit)->get_letter() == letterIn) // Comparison of the letters
00489                 {
00490                         intout = (*transit)->get_statenb();
00491                         found = true;
00492                 }
00493         }
00495         return intout;
00496 }

00513 int O_oracle::get_state(int date)
00514 {
00515         map<int,int>::iterator mapit;
00516         mapit = IDs2states->upper_bound(date);
00517         --mapit;
00519         return (*mapit).second;
00520 }

00557 O_state * O_oracle::operator[] (int i) const
00558 {
00559         if (this!= NULL && size>0 && i<size)
00560                 return(state_vect[i]);
00561         else

00576 ostream & operator<< (ostream & out, const O_oracle & oraclein)
00577 {       
00578         vector<O_state*>::const_iterator O_it;
00579         out<<"digraph "<<oraclein.name<<endl;
00580         out<<"{"<<endl;
00581         out<<"  graph [rankdir=LR];"<<endl;
00582         out<<"  node [shape=circle];"<<endl;
00583         out<<"  nodesep = 0.2;"<<endl;
00584     out<<"      forcelabels = true;"<<endl<<endl;
00585                 
00586         for(O_it = oraclein.state_vect.begin(); O_it != oraclein.state_vect.end(); O_it++)
00587                 out<<**O_it<<endl;
00588         
00589         out<<"}"<<endl;
00590         return(out);
00591 }
